metadata.title: CVE-2024-27937 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a Free Asset and IT Management Software package, Data centermanagement, ITIL Service Desk, licenses tracking and software auditing. Anauthenticated user can obtain the email address of all GLPI users. Thisissue has been patched in version 10.0.13.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
